name: Alien,Ninja,Bear
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: alien ninja bear
des:
How to play:
1. Everyone stands up at the beginning of the game.
2. Everyone pretends to be an alien, ninja, or a bear.
-To be an alien, point your fingers up with your hands at the top of your head
-To be a ninja, give your best karate pose
-To be a bear, show your claws
3. Say 'Next' for Alexa to make the next choice
4. The last one left wins!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
